name: filehost-platform
description: Full-featured file hosting platform with premium tiers

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:server && npm run install:client && npm run install:worker && npm run install:bot
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:worker && npm run build:bot
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:dev: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
